news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Clairity Technology, a climate startup focusing on carbon dioxide removal, secured $6.75M in Seed funding. This investment highlights its entry into the competitive direct air capture market, aiming to innovate in scalable, low-cost carbon harvesting technologies.

about_short_description.short_description: Clairity Technology is a climate startup that creates low-cost, scalable technology to harvest carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

product.name: Direct Air Capture Technology
product.description: A technology that captures CO2 from the atmosphere using inexpensive chemical media and standard construction materials, creating dilute CO2 streams for scalable removal.

product.name: CO2 Sequestration Solutions
product.description: Techniques for the durable sequestration of CO2, including integration into concrete, ocean storage, conversion into rocks, or use in sustainable products.

product.name: Pilot Plant for CO2 Capture
product.description: A facility under development aimed at capturing 100 tons of CO2 per year, with plans for rapid scalability and optimization of energy use and material properties.
